remarks: Foulis-Holland Theorem.  If any 2 pairs in a triple of orthomodular lattice elements commute, the triple is distributive.  First of two parts.  Theorem 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 25.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: fh1 $p |- ( ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH /\ C e. CH ) /\ ( A C_H B /\ A C_H C ) ) -> ( A i^i ( B vH C ) ) = ( ( A i^i B ) vH ( A i^i C ) ) ) $.
